verbs.description: [ARG1: solon resident] [V: sent] [ARG2: to prison] [ARGM-CAU: for stealing 157 000 from trust set up for disabled woman] a solon woman was sentenced to 2 1 2 years in federal prison for defrauding a trust set up for a hudson resident with multiple sclerosis and using the money to pay her personal expenses noel zugay attorney irs probate court donald nugent internal revenue service robert higgins cleveland solon fbi 157 000 cuyahoga county donald c nugent u s attorney office cuyahoga county ohio hudson senior u s district darin thompson teresita sidoti prison ohio federal bureau of investigation
